ya10.3.5:7.1: Āmantā → no (csp1ed) | aññātāvindriyaṁ → aññindriyaṁ (cck, sya1ed, pts-vp-pli1)
ya10.3.5:12.1: Āmantā → cattāro puggalā aññindriyañca na bhāvessanti domanassindriyañca nappajahanti (csp1ed)
ya10.3.5:14.1: Cha puggalā aññindriyaṁ bhāvessanti, no ca domanassindriyaṁ pajahanti anāgāmimaggasamaṅgī aññindriyañca bhāvessati, domanassindriyañca pajahati → no (csp1ed)
ya10.3.5:26.1: Pañca → satta (cck, pts-vp-pli1) | Tayo maggasamaṅgino → aggamaggasamaṅgī (cck, pts-vp-pli1)
